item.title: Trinkets
item.content:encoded:
A bit back I decided to start work on a trinkets section to add to the items category, which will hold, well, trinkets. These are the items you find for example on page 160-161 of the phb.

the current version of the page can be found here: http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/trinkets

My primary question is in terms of formatting. At the moment, im just working with a table, but I do realise this might be a bit nightmarish at some point due to trinkets reaching into the 100's, not accounting for other books.

So, im asking what people think about how it should be organized. I think the bestest option might just be to have something similiar-ish to the spell page/weapons page, with trinkets organized by book perhaps? But that is dependent on how many books have trinkets sections

ah, and the secondary issue: Which books have trinkets? I know for a fact that the PHB and Van Richtens have trinkets sections, but I do not know about which other books have them

Feel free to adjust the page as you wish, because it definetly needs an alternative way of formatting

Thanks
